LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.Stats.LK_MeleeWeapons_A: The average amount of armor weapon will ignore each time it hits the target
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.Stats.LK_RangedWeapons_: Average damage per second adjusted for weapon accuracy
Close range damage per second adjusted for weapon accuracy
Short range damage per second adjusted for weapon accuracy
Medium range damage per second adjusted for weapon accuracy
Long range damage per second adjusted for weapon accuracy
The amount of damage weapon deals in a single hit
The maximum range of a weapon
How much time passes between when a ranged attack begins aiming and when it fires
The amount of shots weapon fires in each burst
How much game ticks passes between burst shots
The average amount of armor weapon will ignore each time it hits the target
Hits from a weapon will stagger targets, slowing their movement for several seconds
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.Stats.LK_Tools_WorkType: Item stats that affect performance according to work type rules
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnType.Colonist.Label: Colonist
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnType.Guest.Label: Guest
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnType.Prisoner.Label: Prisoner
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnType.Slave.Label: Slave
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnType.Animal.Label: Animal
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnHealthState.Healthy: Pawns with no current health issues.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnHealthState.Resting: Pawns that need bed rest to recover.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnHealthState.NeedsTe: Pawns with injuries or illnesses requiring medical attention.
Pawns that are unconscious and unable to move.
Pawns in a state of mental breakdown.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.WorkTypeThingRuleWidget: Select work type using the button above.
The weights of stats used to calculate the score of a particular thing.\nA higher stat weight means that a thing with a higher value for that stat will have more score points.
An enumeration of items that have at least one of the stats listed above, sorted in score descending order.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.UndefinedFil: The settings from the default rule will be used.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterPawnTy: Pawns will be filtered by their types.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.AllowedPawnT: Only pawns of those types that are enabled in this section will be selected.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterPawnHe: Pawns will be filtered by their health states.
Pawns' health states will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.AllowedPawnH: Only pawns in health states that are enabled in this section will be selected.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterWorkPa: Pawns will be filtered by their passion for work types.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.AllowedWorkP: Only pawns with passion values that are enabled in this section will be selected.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterPawnTr: Pawns will be filtered by their traits.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.PawnTraitLim: Only pawns that have any of the enabled traits and none of the disabled traits will be selected. Traits not added in this section will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterPawnCa: Pawns will be filtered by their capacities.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.PawnCapacity: Only pawns whose capacity levels are in the ranges listed below will be selected. Capacities not listed in this section will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterWorkCa: Pawns will be filtered by their work capacities.
Pawn work capacities will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.WorkCapacity: Only pawns that are capable of performing the work types enabled below and are not capable of performing the work types disabled below will be selected. The ability to perform work types not listed in this section will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterPawnSk: Pawns will be filtered by their skill levels.
Pawns' skill levels will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.PawnSkillLim: Only pawns whose skill levels are in the ranges listed below will be selected. Skills not listed in this section will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.FilterPawnSt: Pawns will be filtered by their stat levels.
Pawns' stat levels will be ignored.
LanguageData.LordKuper.Common.PawnFilter.PawnStatLimi: Only pawns whose stat levels are in the ranges listed below will be selected. Stats not listed in this section will be ignored.
